Hi,

I've read the thread about split crawl 
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/=
archive-crawler/message/2141. and have 
a few questions on it. 

Let's say =
I start with 2 machines, each one has its own category. 
For simplicity, le=
t's say machine A deals with *.com and machine B 
deals with non *.com. And=
 they use the same seed list.

After a while machine A generate a list of U=
RLs that contains non 
*.com links. Now, how do I add that list to machine =
B? I know one 
way to add them is to (1) pause B (2) add the list to B's se=
ed list 
(3) restart B. But if I keep doing this, eventually the seed list =

will grow to big and I cannot use GUI to modify it. So let's say I 
bypass=
 GUI and modify the seeds.txt manually. Would that be a 
problem?

Or is th=
ere a better way to handle this?

Thanks,

-joe
